page.title: 06HOMELIFE LOWER WORTLEY LEEDS
page.content: I am 9 years old and I live in a terraced house which has two small gardens where I sometimes play. I also play in the street with my friends but I am not allowed to play in the park because my mum says there are a lot of glue-sniffers there. Near our house there is a beck but not much else of interest. In our house we have an organ, a video, two televisions and two record players. Another 9 year old writes: My house is a detached house, it is big and has two gardens. Around our house there is a park,a football pitch and a river to watch. We play in the street or on the football pitch or sometimes in the park. At home I like to use my radio and the television with the video. We also have a record player in the living room.
